content.text:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                          Artist - Harvey Andrews
                                         *************************
                                                Song - PG 
                                               ***********
                                           Tabbed By - Ayreon77
                                          **********************
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tuning = Standard


INTRO
******
[ch]Em[/ch]


------------------------
VERSE 1
********

When he was a baby they said 
                           [ch]D[/ch]
He had a future, you could take it as read 
                    [ch]C[/ch]
Mom and Dad will do all that they can 
        [ch]B7[/ch]
So that when he's a man 
         [ch]Em[/ch]
He'll be always ahead 

But when he was a boy growing tall 
                     [ch]D[/ch]
His father said, "To hell with it all 
                  [ch]C[/ch]
If I stay I'll be old before time 
         [ch]B7[/ch]
Son, I'm still in my prime
          [ch]Em[/ch]
Son, I'll give you a call" 


------------------------
CHORUS
*******
                  [ch]G[/ch]
But once he was a child full of grace 
                     [ch]D[/ch]
With a smile for the whole human race 
                  [ch]C[/ch]
Now his eyes only stare at the day 
         [ch]B7[/ch]
Till the sun goes away 
     [ch]Em[/ch]
To a happier place 
              [ch]G[/ch]
Once he was a child full of fun 
                  [ch]D[/ch]
With a heart big enough for the sun 
                      [ch]C[/ch]
Now a freeze frame is all he can find 
       [ch]B7[/ch]
And it stays in his mind 
       [ch]Em[/ch]
And it shows what he's done 


------------------------
VERSE 2
********

His mother did her best, but she fell 
                          [ch]D[/ch]
First the bottle then the boozers as well 
                    [ch]C[/ch]                        [ch]B7[/ch]
Uncle Joe and Uncle Jim brought presents for him 
                   [ch]Em[/ch]
But he dreaded the sound of the bell 
      
Till Uncle Mike brought the video round 
                      [ch]D[/ch]
And put it on just to drown out the sound 
                    [ch]C[/ch]
With tapes he could hire from a store 
         [ch]B7[/ch]                  [ch]Em[/ch]
That had goodies galore in a room that he'd found 


------------------------
VERSE 3
********
                 
So the boy learned that love was a game
                       [ch]D[/ch]
Women lose though they fight all the same
                 [ch]C[/ch]
They get beaten again and again 
          [ch]B7[/ch]
They feel terror and pain 
          [ch]Em[/ch]
Then they carry the blame 
                 
And he learned to love cleavers and knives 
              [ch]D[/ch]
Chainsaws and other men's wives 
                   [ch]C[/ch]
He learned to love blood on the floor 
       [ch]B7[/ch]                    [ch]Em[/ch]
And he came to adore all the wasting of lives 


------------------------
CHORUS
*******
                  [ch]G[/ch]
But once he was a child full of grace 
                     [ch]D[/ch]
With a smile for the whole human race 
                  [ch]C[/ch]
Now his eyes only stare at the day 
         [ch]B7[/ch]
Till the sun goes away 
     [ch]Em[/ch]
To a happier place 
              [ch]G[/ch]
Once he was a child full of fun 
                  [ch]D[/ch]
With a heart big enough for the sun 
                      [ch]C[/ch]
Now a freeze frame is all he can find 
       [ch]B7[/ch]
And it stays in his mind 
       [ch]Em[/ch]
And it shows what he's done 


------------------------
VERSE 4
********
     
When they came and took him away 
               [ch]D[/ch]
His mother was out for the day 
                 [ch]C[/ch]                     [ch]B7[/ch]
The girl was thirteen, he'd seen her before 
                         [ch]Em[/ch]
And he thought she could star in his play 

And it was just like the video said 
                   [ch]D[/ch]
She fought and she screamed and she bled 
                 [ch]C[/ch]
His pleasure was short, it was sweet 
        [ch]B7[/ch]                              [ch]Em[/ch]
She was found on the street, where he'd left her for dead 


------------------------
CHORUS
*******
                  [ch]G[/ch]
But once he was a child full of grace 
                     [ch]D[/ch]
With a smile for the whole human race 
                  [ch]C[/ch]
Now his eyes only stare at the day 
         [ch]B7[/ch]
Till the sun goes away 
     [ch]Em[/ch]
To a happier place 
              [ch]G[/ch]
Once he was a child full of fun 
                  [ch]D[/ch]
With a heart big enough for the sun 
                      [ch]C[/ch]
Now a freeze frame is all he can find 
       [ch]B7[/ch]
And it stays in his mind 
       [ch]Em[/ch]
And it shows what he's done 
                      [ch]D[/ch]
Now a freeze frame is all he can find 
   [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]B7[/ch]
It stays in his mind 
       [ch]Em[/ch]
And it shows what he's done


ENJOY....................

[ch]E[/ch]                         [ch]Asus2[/ch]
Lembro-me das noites sem dormir
[ch]C#m[/ch]                               [ch]B5[/ch]  Badd11
Das canções que ouvimos lado a lado
[ch]E[/ch]                       [ch]A[/ch]
Segredos e frases que então trocámos
[ch]C#m[/ch]                  [ch]B5[/ch] Badd11
Naquele vazio do passado
[ch]C#m[/ch]        [ch]Asus2[/ch]     [ch]E[/ch]
Eu sei que tudo passa
     [ch]B5[/ch]         [ch]C#m[/ch]
Tudo fica para trás
       [ch]Asus2[/ch]          [ch]B5[/ch]
Como um livro que não li

            [ch]Asus2[/ch]       [ch]C#m[/ch]         [ch]B5[/ch]      Badd11
Por isso eu sinto e sei que te vou esquecer
         [ch]Asus2[/ch]       [ch]C#m[/ch]
Que desta vez irei dizer
       [ch]E[/ch]
Eu primeiro
       [ch]A[/ch]                [ch]B5[/ch]        [ch]C#m[/ch]
Virar a página e querer rasgar as cartas que eu te escrevi
           [ch]B5[/ch]    Badd11        [ch]Asus2[/ch]
Sei que vou sair e viver sem ti

[ch]E[/ch]                     [ch]Asus2[/ch]
Lembro-me da chuva em Agosto
[ch]C#m[/ch]                      [ch]B5[/ch]   Badd11
E sinto que nada é permanente
[ch]E[/ch]                       [ch]Asus2[/ch]
Sei que tudo muda e que tudo passa
[ch]C#m[/ch]                      [ch]B5[/ch] Badd11
Nunca nada é para sempre
[ch]C#m[/ch]        [ch]Asus2[/ch]
Eu sei que tudo passa
[ch]E[/ch]
Tudo fica para trás
[ch]C#m[/ch]     [ch]Asus2[/ch]          [ch]B5[/ch] Badd11
Como um livro que não li
[ch]A[/ch]                   [ch]C#m[/ch]         [ch]B5[/ch]    Badd11    
Por isso eu sinto e sei que te vou esquecer
         [ch]A[/ch]         [ch]C#m[/ch]
Que desta vez irei dizer
   [ch]E[/ch]
Eu primeiro
        [ch]Asus2[/ch]           [ch]B5[/ch]        [ch]C#m[/ch]
Virar a página e querer rasgar as cartas que eu te escrevi
        [ch]B5[/ch]  Badd11  [ch]A[/ch]
Sei que vou sair e viver sem ti

Solo:

Acordes - [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Asus2[/ch] [ch]C#m[/ch] [ch]B5[/ch] Badd11
          [ch]A[/ch] [ch]C#m[/ch] [ch]B5[/ch] Badd11 (2x)


            [ch]A[/ch]       [ch]C#m[/ch]            [ch]B5[/ch]
Por isso eu sinto e sei que te vou esquecer
          [ch]A[/ch]        [ch]C#m[/ch]
Que desta vez irei dizer
   [ch]E[/ch]
Eu primeiro
        [ch]A[/ch]               [ch]B5[/ch]        [ch]C#m[/ch]
Virar a página e querer rasgar as cartas que eu te escrevi
        [ch]B5[/ch]  Badd11 [ch]A[/ch]
Sei que vou sair e viver sem ti


[ch]E[/ch] [ch]A[/ch] (alternar [ch]E[/ch] terminar [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]E[/ch])
Sei que vou sair
Vou te esquecer

Sei que vou sair
Viver sem ti

(A verse in 4/4 time)
[ch]Am[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]Dm[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]
Ki saart alay lanetzach enagnekh
[ch]E7[/ch]           [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]Dm[/ch]   [ch]E7[/ch]
Shav choma atzur lakh, shav atziv dlatayim
[ch]Am[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]Dm[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]
Tshukati Elayikh, veelay ganekh
[ch]E7[/ch]       [ch]Am[/ch]             [ch]Dm[/ch]   [ch]E7[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]
Veelay gufi scharchar oved yadayim

(B verse in 3/4 time)
[ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]Dm[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]E7[/ch]
Lasfarim rak at hachet vehashofetet
[ch]Am[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]     [ch]Dm[/ch]           [ch]E7[/ch]
Pitomit laad, eynay bakh halumot
[ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]Dm[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]E7[/ch]
Et birchov lochem, shotet shkiot shel petel
[ch]Am[/ch]      [ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]E7[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]
Tealmi oti laalumot

[ch]E[/ch]              [ch]B[/ch]                            [ch]C#m[/ch]
 Personajes que deambulan todo dia colocados.
                                              [ch]A[/ch]
 Se sienten muy rebeldes, se sienten obligados
                       [ch]G#[/ch]                                [ch]B[/ch]
 a contar a todo el mundo que ellos son muy diferentes,

 que los demas somos tontos y ellos los inteligentes.


[ch]E[/ch]                      [ch]B[/ch]                         [ch]C#m[/ch]
 Personajes que quizas intentaran dar un sermon con la mandibula colgando.
            [ch]A[/ch]                   [ch]G#[/ch]                          [ch]B[/ch]
 Te hablaran del consumismo tras meterse tres pastillas y dos gramos.


 [ch]E[/ch]                              [ch]B[/ch]
 Que vacilan de ser criticos con lo que les rodea,
        [ch]C#m[/ch]
 que se miren a si mismos y veran que cosa mas fea
        [ch]A[/ch]                               [ch]G#[/ch]                             [ch]B[/ch]
 y que me digan donde esta su rebelion cuando el estado nos golpea.


             [ch]E[/ch]                          [ch]B[/ch]
Que me expliquen lo que entienden ellos por revolución,
        [ch]C#m[/ch]
por libertad, por compromiso, por luxar, por adicción,
        [ch]A[/ch]                    [ch]G#[/ch]               [ch]B[/ch]
por conformismo, por ser punk o por ser un borrego.


[ch]E[/ch]            [ch]B[/ch]              [ch]C#m[/ch]
 No comprendo cual es vuestra libertad,
              [ch]E[/ch]      [ch]B[/ch]           [ch]C#m[/ch]
 no alcanzo ver cual es vuestra luxa.
[ch]E[/ch]            [ch]B[/ch]              [ch]C#m[/ch]
 No comprendo cual es vuestra libertad,
              [ch]E[/ch]      [ch]B[/ch]           [ch]C#m[/ch]
 no alcanzo ver cual es vuestra luxa.


      [ch]E[/ch]                     [ch]B[/ch]
Personajes que no tienen ni la más remota idea
     [ch]C#m[/ch]
del real significado de los simbolos que llevan,
       [ch]A[/ch]                        [ch]G#[/ch]
para ellos la anarquia es ponerse todos los dias
      [ch]B[/ch]
y cortar todas las camisetas y meterlas en lejia.


   [ch]E[/ch]                           [ch]B[/ch]
Destruir vuestro cerebro como forma de protestar,
          [ch]C#m[/ch]
no hace mas que demostrarme
                               [ch]A[/ch]    [ch]G#[/ch]               [ch]B[/ch]
que debajo de ese parche no hay nada que merezca la pena.


     [ch]E[/ch]                          [ch]B[/ch]                         [ch]C#m[/ch]
Otra vez os vi tirados en el suelo, entre charcos de pota.
          [ch]A[/ch]                   [ch]G#[/ch]                     [ch]B[/ch]
Otra vez senti la rabia y la pena por vuestra derrota.
         [ch]E[/ch]                        [ch]B[/ch]
Que escapar de los problemas nunca fue la solución,
                [ch]C#m[/ch]
aunque en un momento dado dejes de sentirte mal,
  [ch]A[/ch]                         [ch]G#[/ch]              [ch]B[/ch]
que dar la cara es mas duro, pero almenos es real.


[ch]E[/ch]            [ch]B[/ch]              [ch]C#m[/ch]
 No comprendo cual es vuestra libertad,
              [ch]E[/ch]      [ch]B[/ch]           [ch]C#m[/ch]
 no alcanzo ver cual es vuestra luxa.
[ch]E[/ch]            [ch]B[/ch]              [ch]C#m[/ch]
 No comprendo cual es vuestra libertad,
              [ch]E[/ch]      [ch]B[/ch]           [ch]C#m[/ch]
 no alcanzo ver cual es vuestra luxa.


[ch]E[/ch]               [ch]B[/ch]              [ch]C#m[/ch]                    [ch]E[/ch]
¿Donde esta la diferencia entre un esclavo del dinero
        [ch]B[/ch]                  [ch]A[/ch]
y un esclavo de las drogas?
